name: Run Like Hell (ManuelCosta)
description:
Run like hell is a infinite side-scroller game set in a dystopian modern city.  Inspired by "Everyday the same dream" and "Cannabalt", the player plays as a man trying to run away from the monotony of the city.

Speed and momentum were the key words that defined the design and feel of the game, making all the shapes and animations oriented towards a sense of fluidity and a sense of speed that is increasingly faster the better the player is at avoiding obstacles. The content on itself, is generated through an algorithm at run time, making each play different and unpredictable and at the same making sure that the experience is intense and not unfair to the player.
